reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Promoting protection of Women and Children from Gender Based violence and early forced Marriages in Lesotho. The project aims at promoting access to justice for Women and Children and raising awareness on Gender based violence in Lesotho and also to launc h an Advocacy campaign to enactment of the Domestic violence bill. Some of the expected results include the following: To increase public awareness on the rights of women and children in relation to early child forced marriages and Gender based violence. To train child and Protection Unit(Police) Councillors and area chiefs to be sensitized.
